parse: Conjunction
str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Preposition
str2: From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Noun - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Reciprocal Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: One another, each other. Genitive plural from allos reduplicated; one another.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Adjective - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Little, small. Including the comparative mikroteros apparently a primary word; small (figuratively) dignity).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From a derivative of theaomai; to be a spectator of, i.e. Discern, (experience) or intensively (acknowledge).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Adverb
str2: Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.

parse: Adjective - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Little, small. Including the comparative mikroteros apparently a primary word; small (figuratively) dignity).

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Conjunction
str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To go away, depart, begone, die. From hupo and ago; to lead under, i.e. Withdraw or retire, literally or figuratively.

parse: Preposition
str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Article - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
